On 15 July 2016, Turkey faced a coup attempt.
This attempt on July 15 has proved that Turkey is facing a terrorist attack by becoming a military coup attempt.
In response to this development, we acted immediately. We gave instructions to our relevant units and took steps to stop the coup attempt.
We invited our nationality, our country, our country, our nation, to go out to all the squares, to claim the state and democracy.
In spite of all the threats and threats, we moved to Istanbul and put forward our stable position against the courageous people with the nationality.
RT @JFriedman44: New: readout from @PressSec of @POTUS calls today to Baton Rouge law enforcement officials and families https://t.co/2oexG…
The helicopters and the planes did not work for the coup deers in the face of the nationality's steadfast commitment to their will.
The attempts of the sharps, which handed over their ideals to the Fethullahçı terrorist organization, have failed in the face of the will of the nation and the state.
Those who shoot on the nation without breaking their eyes, they will be afraid, the squares will be pulled out of their streets ...
He wrote a legendary epic heroism with his country and his future standing upright against military terrorists.
I wish mercy from Allah to our martyrs and their families, and our wounded wish for immediate healing.
The news that we are a single civilian citizen who supports the darbacies by going out on the streets of Turkey anywhere, did not come to the pound.
The July 15 coup attempt will take place in the glorious history of this nation as a great lesson for the nation's coup enthusiasts.
The July 15 coup attempt is a betrayal against our Turkish Armed Forces along with all of our nationality.
The uniform on them will never change the fact that the July 15th terrorists are members of a betrayal gang.
Turkish Armed Forces and our soldiers are our eyes.
These cancer cells, which have spread to our Turkish Armed Forces as well as every institution of our country, will be cleaned rapidly.
Studies already carried out at other institutions, especially the judiciary and the security organization, have been accelerated following this development.
On the basis of the coup attempt of July 15th, we do not accept any action and accusation that will leave our Mehmet Çizimiz under suspicion.
It is the coup supporters who try to legitimize the coup attempt with false and wrong images and to show the terrorists as victims.
The name of the attempt on July 15 is treason. Whatever the punishment of treason in the world, these terrorists will be subjected to the same penalty.
For the first time in the history of our country, the attempt of a military coup in this dimension has been hampered by the nation itself.
Those who survived this coup attempt are not a weakness of our country's democracy, but rather how strong our democracy is.
I present gratitude to each of the citizens of the streets for the emergence of the coup attempt and for the calls I made.
I would like to thank each of my citizens who could not find the opportunity to go out on the street, and pray at home with his prayers, with his heart, with his tears.
I congratulate each of our deputies who have honor, dignity and honor of the nation they represent.
I would like to express my gratitude to the General Presidents of our political parties for demonstrating that democracy has a strong stance on the part of the national will.
I offer my most heartfelt gratitude to each member of our Police Force, the major contributor to the failure of this coup attempt.
I congratulate the members of the media who have a clear and solid position in the face of uniformed terrorists despite the weapon tehdidine.
I express my gratitude to all our soldiers who show that they are members of the nation's army, not the slave of any organization or organization.
I express my gratitude to the countries that support the legitimate government in Turkey, to the state and government authorities, to the friendly and brotherly communities.
From now on, neither the Fethullahist terrorist faction nor the supporters of other terrorist organizations will be shown a minimum of compassion.
There is no other alternative than a system in which Turkey is democracy, the state of law, and fundamental rights and freedoms are assured.
No one, no matter what discourse or purpose, no longer has the right to pay the price.
We will not be pleased and pleased with those who are waiting for Turkey to get in trouble, kneel, give up and rub their hands.
